# frontegg_secret (Resource)

Configures a Frontegg secret.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `key` (String) The key of the secret.
- `value` (String, Sensitive) The value of the secret.

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
